stages.title: Intern at Médecins d'Afrique NGO
stages.description: Assistant in the fight against endemic diseases and co-responsible for the school health revitalization project (RESASCO).

stages.title: Intern at BACONGO Health District: Data Management and Epidemiological Surveillance
stages.description: Responsible for data collection and entry in DHIS2, formative supervision of data entry, and participation in micro-planning of district activities.

stages.title: Intern at the Central Directorate of the National Program for Onchocerciasis Control
stages.description: Participate in planning mass drug distribution activities in various health districts of Brazzaville, ensure the availability of medicines, and write reports on the activities carried out.

professionalExperience.title: Independent Monitor for the 1st Round of the National Polio Vaccination Campaign in BACONGO Health District
professionalExperience.description: Check the vaccination status of children aged 0 to 5 years, identify those who are not vaccinated and proceed with their vaccination, while asking parents about the reasons for the non-vaccination of their children.

professionalExperience.title: Supervisor for the Intensified Vaccination Activities (AVI) at Madame Health Center in BACONGO Health District
professionalExperience.description: Monitor field teams in their tasks, ensure the achievement of set vaccination goals for children, and write a final report on the activities carried out at Madame Health Center.

professionalExperience.title: Surveyor for a Study on the Detention of Postpartum Women in MAKÉLÉKÉLÉ Maternity Wards
professionalExperience.description: Verify the presence of postpartum women detained in maternity wards and inquire about the reasons for their detention.
